players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Sad to see Diana gone so quickly. I think we need to focus on finding the detective—Bob, can you share what you think happened?"

Charlie: "It's a shame Diana is gone. I'm a villager, so I don't have any special abilities. I'll be looking to see who seems suspicious and who is trying to lead the conversation. Alice, I'm not sure why you..."
Bob: "I have evidence that Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. We need to focus on voting her out today to protect the town."
Bob: "Alice has been confirmed as the mafioso by my investigation. We must vote her out now before she can kill again. Trust me, this is the best chance for the town to survive."
You: "Alice here. Bob, your claim to have investigated me is suspicious since I was active and speaking freely just now. Why reveal your role so soon with no proof?"

Charlie: "Bob, you claimed to investigate Alice last night and found her to be the mafioso. However, Alice is still active and speaking. If you were the detective, wouldn't the mafia try to eliminate you to prevent further investigations? Also, why are you so insistent..."
